page.title: 09BREAN SANDS HOLIDAY CAMP (2)
page.content: The camp site shops cater for different needs from food to toiletries.There are plenty of activities for children which includes a BMX track,crazy golf,snooker and arcadesty to name a few. For parents who wish to have a night or day to themselves there is a childs nursery.Children under two years of age come free of charge as do cots and high chairs.Accomadation is for up to eight people in well equipped holiday chalets complete with fitted kitchen area,colour tv and bed linen provided free. The restaurant serves snacks and meals at all convenient times of the day and evening.The holiday camp caters for five thousand people. Local coach rides come at quite reasonable prices to places like Weston-Super-Mare etc.
